description: Template for defining a client's organizational hierarchy. Copy this file and customize for each client.
notes: This template creates a 3-level hierarchy: Division → Department → Team
Each division will have all departments
Each department will have all teams
Customize the names and descriptions to match your client's structure
You can add or remove items from each array

usage.step_1: Copy this file and rename it to hierarchy-config.json (or client-specific name)
usage.step_2: Customize the divisions, departments, and teams to match your client
usage.step_3: Use the /api/client/setup-hierarchy endpoint with this config
usage.step_4: Or manually create the structure using the Supabase dashboard
